org.cove.jade.constraints
Class SpringConstraint

    java.lang.Object
    org.cove.jade.constraints.SpringConstraint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constraint
public class SpringConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constraint

Class implementing a spring constraint. This attempts to constrain the distance between 2 particles to a particular value (by default, the distance when the simulator started). 

    JADE - JAva Dynamics Engine
    Release 0.6.1 alpha 2005-12-28
    SpringConstraint class

setStiffness
